a1: We calculate the exact difference between your birth date and today (or a target date) in years, months, and days, accounting for varying month lengths.
q2: Can I calculate age between two specific dates?
a2: Yes, you can set both a birth date and a custom target date to calculate the age difference between any two dates.
q3: Is the calculation accurate for leap years?
a3: Yes, our calculator accounts for leap years and varying month lengths to provide precise results.
a4: It shows years, months, days, plus total months, total weeks, total days, and total hours.
a5: No, all calculations happen locally in your browser. No data is sent to any server.
